CustomField.description: If this box is checked, users will be allowed to create Quotes through the Salesforce UI that are not linked to a parent object. If this box is unchecked, users will be forced to select an opportunity (or account) to which the quote will be attached when created. This checkbox has no impact on Quotes created through Oracle CPQ Cloud Unplugged or through the Salesforce Data Loader.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this box is checked, users will be allowed to create Quotes through the Salesforce UI that are not linked to a parent object. If this box is unchecked, users will be forced to select a parent object to which the quote will be attached when created.
CustomField.label: Allow Orphan Creation
